data.scheme_name: Scheme for Interest Subvention to Nano Household Enterprises - For General & OBC category (Female Entrepreneurs) - Existing
data.benefits: The scheme provides interest subvention of up to 8% per annum for three years on term loans.
data.eligibility: All existing nano and household enterprises engaged in the manufacturing, services as well as job work can apply under the scheme are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
Units making fixed capital investment of Rs.10 lakh or less.
Units connected load should be 5 HP or less..
data.beneficiaries: All existing nano and household enterprises engaged in the manufacturing, services as well as job work can apply under the scheme are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
Units making fixed capital investment of Rs.10 lakh or less.
Units connected load should be 5 HP or less..
data.context:
• The new scheme for providing financial assistance to nano and household units is to support units with capital investment of Rs.5 lakhs or less for manufacturing units and units engaged in job work. 
  • The assistance is by way of interest subvention on the term loan availed for a period of three years on re-imbursement basis. The assistance is provided for the first three years after the unit is set up. 
  • In the first year, assistance is given without considering prompt repayment. During the 2nd and 3rd years interest subvention is accorded if there is prompt repayment of loan with interest. Thus it is a big relief in the early stages of business.
data.objective: The scheme intends to provide financial assistance in the form of interest subvention to nano and household enterprises on a reimbursement basis for the term loan availed by the unit.
data.description: The scheme provides interest subvention of up to 8% per annum for three years on term loans.
data.how_to_apply: The application can be submitted online or in person to the Assistant District Industries Officer, Taluk Industries Office concerned with all supporting documents.
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the benefits directly in the bank account after the approval from the concerned authority.
data.additional_info:
Units must be in white and green category as per pollution control norms,
Manufacturing units that have already received assistance under the Entrepreneur Support Scheme or other government schemes (India or Kerala) cannot apply under this scheme.
Units that have availed special low-interest rates from government agencies are not eligible for further interest subvention under this scheme.
In the event of default of re-payment of loan with interest at the end of 1st year, the subvention will not be passed. The same is applicable for 2nd and 3rd years.

Negative list of industries: https://industry.kerala.gov.in/index.php/schemes-mainmenu/interest-subvention-scheme-to-nano-units-schemes
data.checklist_info_a:
Udyam Registration Certificate
Bank Statement
Repayment Schedule
GST Registration Certificate
Other relevant documents (as required)

data.lifecycle: Required Credit Support for Scale - Up
